PHRASE.LANG: Explore the hidden depths of your Keep. This expansion also adds to the rewards in the Crystal Hunter game, as well as owner only rewards by feeding the dungeon monster!\n\n*The Dungeon can only be purchased if you already own Avalon Keep. [#Legal]

Explorez les profondeurs cachées de votre donjon.

*Le donjon ne peut être acheté si vous possédez déjà Avalon Keep

Explore the hidden depths of your Keep. This expansion also adds to the rewards in the Crystal Hunter game, as well as owner only rewards by feeding the dungeon monster!

*The Dungeon can only be purchased if you already own Avalon Keep. [#Legal]

Entdecken Sie die verborgenen Tiefen des aufbewahren.

*Der Kerker kann nur erworben werden, wenn Sie besitzen bereits Avalon Keep

*The Dungeon can only be purchased if you already own Avalon Keep. [#Legal]

Esplorare le profondità nascoste del vostro Keep.

*Il Segreta possono essere acquistati solo se si dispone già di Avalon Keep
